content.en: Stock market forecasting: Researchers are exploring various algorithms to improve the forecasting of the Istanbul stock market and time series prediction. These algorithms include artificial neural networks, genetic algorithms, particle swarm optimization, fuzzy clustering, neuro-fuzzy modeling, hybrid learning algorithm, high-order multi-variable fuzzy time-series algorithm, automatic clustering techniques, generalized fuzzy logical relationships, high-order weighted fuzzy time-series model, harmony search intelligence algorithm, fuzzy transform, fuzzy logical relationships, fuzzy C-Regression Model clustering algorithm, cluster analysis problem-based fuzzy time-series model, supervised learning, k-order fuzzy relationships, multiple linear regression, time series clustering, Markov chain, C-Means clustering, improved fuzzy clustering techniques, improved fuzzy relationships, interval type-2 fuzzy C-means clustering, ANFIS, fuzzy cluster analysis algorithm, improved fuzzy relationships for variation of data, interval index number, membership value, and normal fuzzy function. These algorithms aim to enhance the accuracy and efficiency of forecasting and prediction models for various applications, including air pollution prediction and non-stationary time series forecasting.
content.da: Aktieprognose: Forskere undersøger forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre prognosen for Istanbul-aktiemarkedet og tidsseriefremskrivning. Disse algoritmer omfatter kunstige neurale netværk, genetiske algoritmer, partikel-sværm-optimering, fuzzy clustering, neuro-fuzzy modellering, hybrid læringsalgoritme, høj-ordens multi-variable fuzzy-tidsserie-algoritme, automatiske clustering-teknikker, generaliserede fuzzy logiske relationer, høj-ordens vægtet fuzzy-tidsserie-model, harmony search intelligence-algoritme, fuzzy transformation, fuzzy logiske relationer, fuzzy C-regressions-model clustering-algoritme, clusteranalyse problem-baseret fuzzy-tidsserie-model, overvåget læring, k-ordens fuzzy relationer, multiple lineære regressioner, tidsserie-clustering, Markov-kæde, C-Means clustering, forbedrede fuzzy clustering-teknikker, forbedrede fuzzy relationer, interval type-2 fuzzy C-means clustering, ANFIS, fuzzy clusteranalyse-algoritme, forbedrede fuzzy relationer for variation af data, intervalindeksnummer, medlemsværdier og normal fuzzy-funktion. Disse algoritmer har til formål at forbedre nøjagtigheden og effektiviteten af prognose- og forudsigelsesmodeller til forskellige anvendelser, herunder luftforudsigelse og ikke-stationær tidsserieprognose.
